Title: Framework agreement procedure first stage
Description: The contracting process is the second stage of a framework agreement procedure. The related process is the contracting process that established the framework agreement.

Title: Planning process
Description: The related process is the planning process that planned the contracting process.

Title: Parent contract (for sub-contracts)
Description: This contracting process might result in a sub-contract of the related process.

Title: Prior process
Description: This contracting process follows on from the related successful process.

Title: Prior process (replacement)
Description: The contracting process aims to replace one or more contracts from the related contracting process.

Title: Prior process (renewal)
Description: The contracting process aims to renew one or more contracts from the related contracting process.

Title: Prior process (additional)
Description: The contracting process aims to purchase additional goods, services or works related to the goods, services or works purchased from the same supplier in the related contracting process.

Title: Prior process (repetition)
Description: This contracting process is for the purchase of new goods, services or works that constitute a repetition of the goods, services or works purchased from the same supplier in the related process.

Title: Unsuccessful process
Description: This contracting process follows on from the related unsuccessful process.
